Question: Which of the following statements is true regarding the soundtrack of the movie 'The Kashmir Files' released in 2022?
Options:
A. Both themes are vocal songs featured in the movie.
B. Both themes are instrumental themes from the soundtrack of the movie.
C. One theme is from the opening credits while the other is from the ending credits.
D. The soundtrack contains only one theme throughout the movie.
Answer: Both themes are instrumental themes from the soundtrack of the movie.
